a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Urban improved water access vs. rural water access, 2020
Data source: WHO/UNICEF Joint Monitoring Programme (JMP) for Water Supply and Sanitation
Note: An improved drinking water source includes piped water on premises (piped household water connection located inside the user’s
dwelling, plot or yard), and other improved drinking water sources (public taps or standpipes, tube wells or boreholes, protected dug wells,
